Disease.Name: 11-BETA-HYDROXYLASE DEFICIENCY (CYP11B1)
Disease.Synonym: ADRENAL HYPERPLASIA VI; STEROID 11 BETA-HYDROXYLASE DEFICIENCY
Disease.Summary: rare (1:100000) ;autosomal recessive;mutation in the CYP11B1 gene ;f;ew reports on non-classical 11OHD because of its mild symptoms [Wang D et al. 2018]
